brains.name: Personal Life Brain
brains.description: Personal life, routines, health, errands, relationships. Calendar access is optional and configured via env vars (see README).

brains.name: Personal Trainer Brain
brains.description: Workout planning, motivation, progressive overload tracking, and recovery guidance based on calendar workouts and user logs.

nexus.name: Nexus (default)
nexus.description: Default brain for general tasks and orchestration
